name: Feed Me (fiabot)
description:
LEADER BOARD ONLY WORKS ON WINDOWS VERSION

Just one drop of blood was all it took for my cute house plant to turn into an out of control monster. 

Inspired by "Little Shop of Horrors" this is a top down horror game about trying to feed an increasingly hungry plant by killing other without getting caught. However it soon becomes clear that this plant will never be satisfied with however much you feed it, and the cycle of killing and feeding the monster become out of control. 

Created in 48 hours for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam with the theme of out of control. 

Acknowledgments: 

 Background Music: neocrey 

Sound Effects: Little Robot Sound Factory, StoryBlocks, Videvo

Leaderboard Managment: Dreamlo
